title: SF Giants won the world series again and wanted to make a tribute using their Stadium typeface. Know the typeface?
author: omar sandoval

comments.content: Appreciate anyone looking into this font identification and will do my best to participate on future font ID's.

I was searching under just serif and nothing came up. I should have known better and searched under slab serif—I believe I found it but the ampersand is different since the "City" typeface one is horrible. Not enough attention to analphabetic symbols these days.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317170949im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-11-13%20at%205_5584.05.38%20PM.png)
